maqras.text: hananim-eun ijeon-e abeulaham ege jichimseoleul jueoss-eumyeo geuleul jal asinola
geuttae geuneun geuui abeojiwa baegseong-ege yeoleobundeul-i sungbaehaneun i usangdeul-i mueos-inyo lago malha yeossdeola
ittae geudeul-eun uli seonjodeul-i geugeos-eul sungbaehaessnolago malhaja
geuga malhagil yeoleobungwa yeoleo bun-ui seonjodeul-i bunmyeonghi banghwanghaessnola
geudeul-i malhagil nega ulie ge jinsil-eul malhaneunyo animyeon uli leul jolonghaneunyo
ittae geuga malhagil neohuiui junim-eun cheonjileul changjohasin bun-igeoneul naega geugeos-eul jeungmyeonghaneun han jung-in-i la
hananimkke maengsehasa naneun neo huiga deung-eul deulligo tteonan hue neohuiusangdeul-e daehanghaneun gyehoeg-eul se-ulila
geulihayeo geuneun gajang keun u sang-eul je-oehan modeun geos-eul kkaetteulyeossno la amado geudeul-i geuegelo dol-a olila
geudeul-i dol-awa malhagil nuga uliui sindeul-ege ileon jis-eul haessneu nyo sillo saaghan jadeul-ila
geudeul-i malhagil abeulaham-ilaneun cheongnyeon-i geugeos-e gwanhayeo malhaneun geos-eul deul-eossseubnida
geudeul-i malhagil geuleul salam deul boneundelo delyeoola ama geudeul i jeung-eon-eul halila
i sindeul-eul pagoehan jaga baloabeulaham neoinyo lago geudeul-i mal hani
geuga malhagil amado geudeul gaunde dumog-i geulaess-eulila geudeul-i mal-eul hal su issdamyeon mul-eobola hayeossdeola
geuleoja geudeul-eun seolo dol-abo myeonseo sillo uliga jalmoshago issno lago maldeulhadeola
geuleon hu geudeul-eun suchiseuleoum eulo danghwanghamyeo malhagil neoneun ideul i malhaji mosham-eul jal algo issno la
geuga malhagil hananim daesin neohuiege yuighajido anihago haeloumdo eobsneun geos-eul sungbaehago issneunyo
hananim oee daleun geos-eul midneundangsindeul-i galyeonhadaneun geos-eul neohuineun-alji moshaneunyo
geuleoja geudeul-i malhagil seungli halyeomyeon geuleul bultaewo beoligo sindeul eul bohohala hadeola
hananim-i myeonglyeonghasa bul-a sig eola geuligo abeulaham-eul anjeonke hala hayeossnola
ileohdeus geudeul-i geuege eummo leul kkumyeoss-euna hananim-eun geudeul-eul pae baejalo mandeul-eossnola
hananim-i geuleul guhago geuwa lus-eul baegseongdeul-eul wihae chugbognaelin ttang eulo annaehayeossnola
hananim-eun geuege isag-eul ju eossgo sonjalo yagob-eul jueoss-eumyeo geu deul moduleul uiloun jalo mandeul-eossno la

hananim-eun geudeul-eul geubun-ui myeong lyeong-e ttala baegseong-eul indohaneun jido jadeullo dueossgo seonhaeng-eul silcheonhago yebaeleul deuligo iseullamseleul naedologgyesileul naelini geudeul-eun geubun-ege bogjonghayeossdeola
los-ege jihyewa jisig-eul ju eo bulgyeolhan il-eul hayeo wassdeon go-eullobuteo geuleul guhaess-euni sillo geudeul-eun saag-eul haenghaneun baegseongdeul-ieossnola
hananim-eun geuege jabileul be pul-eossnola geuneun sillo uiin jung-eseo han salam-ieossdeola
noaga ijeon-e hananim-ege guwonhaess-eul ttae hananim-eun geuege dab hayeo geuwa geuui gajog-eul keun jaeang eulobuteo guhayeossnola
hananim-ui malsseum-eul bujeonghan baeg seong-eulobuteo geuleul guhan hu geudeul moduneun saaghan baegseong-iyeoss-eumeulo hananim-eun geudeul moduleul igsake hayeossno la

dawisgwa sollomon-eul sang-giha la eotteon baegseong-ui yangdeul-i bamjung-e gil-eul jalmosdeul-eo nongjang-eul jisbalb-a noh-ass eul ttae geu dul-eun simpan-eul hayeossgo ha nanim-eun geudeul-ui simpan-eul moggyeoghayeossnola

hananim-eun sollomon-eulo hayeo geu munjeleul ihaetolog hago geudeul gagja-ege jihyewa jisig-eul jueoss-eumyeo sandeulgwa saedeullo hayeogeum dawisgwa deo bul-eo hananim-eul wihae chansongke hayeoss euni hananim-eun geuleohge hal su iss eossnola
hananim-eun dawis-ege gab-os-eul mandeuneun geos-eul galeuchyeo jueossnani ineun neohuiga jeonjaeng-eseo neohuileul boho hagi wiham-ila neohuineun gamsahago issneunyo
sollomon-ege neunglyeog-eul jusa ha nanim-i chugboghan ttang-eulo geuui myeong lyeong-e ttala pogpung-uga buldoleug hayeoss-eu ni hananim-eun modeun geos-eul algo gyesinola
sollomon-eul wihayeo jamsudeul-eul hayeo geuege sunjongtolog hayeossgo geubakk-ui daleun il-eul hage hayeoss-eumyeo ie hananim-eun geudeul-i geuui myeonglyeong-eseo beos-eonaji moshadolog hayeossnola
